answers.author: Christine Thompson
answers.text:
This is difficult for me to answer because we are in the process of making major changes for 2014 due to health care reform.  We are concluding our first year of a program where the number of points equated to increased dollars.  I can send you the score card however we learned that we had too many items on it this year which made it feel overwhelming. The dollars were to be deposited into a stand alone HRA that the city has given to employees for many years.  Health care reform does not allow us to offer this program in 2014.  My current proposal is to offer an HSA and make quarterly deposits to that account based on achieving specific goals.
